# Clean Aperture Extension Constants

**API Collection**

Constants that identify clean aperture extensions.

## Constants

- **kCMFormatDescriptionKey_CleanApertureHeight**: A key that identifies the clean aperture height value.
- **kCMFormatDescriptionKey_CleanApertureHeightRational**: A key that identifies the clean aperture height rational value.
- **kCMFormatDescriptionKey_CleanApertureHorizontalOffset**: A key that describes the clean aperture height horizontal offset value.
- **kCMFormatDescriptionKey_CleanApertureHorizontalOffsetRational**: A key that identifies the clean aperture horizontal offset rational value.
- **kCMFormatDescriptionKey_CleanApertureVerticalOffset**: A key that identifies the clean aperture vertical offset value.
- **kCMFormatDescriptionKey_CleanApertureVerticalOffsetRational**: A key that identifies the clean aperture vertical offset rational value.
- **kCMFormatDescriptionKey_CleanApertureWidth**: A key that identifies the clean aperture width value.
- **kCMFormatDescriptionKey_CleanApertureWidthRational**: A key that identifies the clean aperture width rational value.

## Constants

- **Audio Format Description Mask Codes**: Mask codes that identify audio formats.
- **Chroma Location Extension Constants**: Constants that identify chroma location extensions.
- **Closed Caption Format Type Constants**: Types that identify closed caption formats.
- **Color Primary Extension Constants**: Constants that identify color primary extensions.
- **Field Detail Extension Constants**: Constants that identify field detail extensions.
- **Format Description Bridge Error Codes**: Bridge errors the system returns from format description calls.
- **Format Description Constants**: Constants that identify format descriptions.
- **Format Description Error Codes**: Errors the system returns from format description calls.
- **HEVC Temporal Level Info Constants**: Constants that identify HEVC temporal level information.
- **Metadata Format Description Constants**: Constants that identify metadata format descriptions.
- **MPEG-2-conformant Formats**: Constants that identify MPEG-2 formats.
- **Pixel Aspect Ratio Extension Constants**: Constants that identify pixel aspect ratio extensions.
- **Text Display Flags**: Flags that identify text display methods.
- **Text Format Constants**: Types that identify text formats.
- **Text Format Description Constants**: Constants that identify text format descriptions.
